statements: DELETE FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE satellite_id = 1 AND data_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM climate_satellite_data WHERE launch_date < '2022-01-01' AND data_value > 50.0;
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 101 AND image_timestamp = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM satellite_data WHERE temperature > 100 AND satellite_id = 3;
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE image_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND image_url LIKE '%clouds%';
DELETE FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature < 10 AND humidity > 80;
DELETE FROM Satellite_Commands WHERE command_type = 'reboot' AND satellite_id = 2;
